p: The main aetiological agents responsible for ARIs in children include Streptococcus pneumoniae, Haemophilus influenzae type b (Hib), Staphylococcus aureus and other bacterial species, respiratory syncytial virus (RSV), measles virus, human parainfluenza viruses type 1, 2, and 3 (PIV-1, PIV-2 and PIV-3), influenza virus (INF) and varicella virus.
